text:
In a corner of a rapidly developing city,
two voices echo quietly in the gap
between the buildings.

name: Turbak's Father
text:
Watch closely, Turbak.
This is the last bonfire that connects
this star and its people.

name: Turbak's Father
text:
...No, that's not it.
The people of this city no longer wish
to be connected to the star.

name: Turbak's Father
text:
The forests have been cleared,
and the land has become a mining facility.
Our days of living by the star is over.

name: Turbak's Father
text:
This park, which we've preserved for the sake of the ritual,
is also going to be turned into a commercial building.
The leveling work is scheduled to start next week.

name: Turbak's Father
text:
The role of the ritualist ends here.
...I wasn't able to pass down
to you what I've inherited myself.

name: Turbak's Father
text:
Even though, you've told me you wanted to take on the role!
I'm truly sorry, Turbak.
Please forgive your worthless father...!

name: Turbak
text:
...Dad.
Don't make that face now,
I'm totally fine with it.

name: Turbak
text:
It's true that this might be sad, but
it is what the people of this city wanted.
That means, it's going to be a happy future!

name: Turbak
text:
Besides, Dad.
I'm not giving up on passing it on to someone.
I'll leave this star, and—

name: Turbak
text:
I'll travel to all sorts of stars,
and I'll pass on what I've inherited
to the people of other stars.

name: Turbak
text:
If it remains in someone's memory, that means
I've passed it on to someone else, right?
I'm sure, that that is my role.

name: Turbak's Father
text:
...I see.
You're really a good boy, Turbak.
Thank you... Thank you...

name: Turbak
text:
W-Wait a minute, Dad!?
We're in the middle of the ritual,
so please wipe your tears!

name: Turbak
text:
...Leave it to me!
I'm sure I can do it.
Because I'm a 'good boy'.

Chapter 7:
Stella Link Carnival

name: Imposter Villain
text: GRRRRRRR!!

The attackers all at once,
and the many paths they forced open.

And, manifested from those paths,
the Parallel Weapons stick together
and fuse in a distorted way.

No longer retaining its original form,
the black, sludge-like thing
covered the attackers like a suit...

It became 'a single mass of attackers'
and let out a voiceless roar.

And that mass, like a newborn
animal, slowly checks
its own movements, step by step.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
H... H-Hey...
What is that thing...?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I-Is that a villain...?
All those people are being
swallowed up by that black thing~!?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
It doesn't look like it's going to
attack right away, but it's so big,
what should we do~...!

options.text: W-We have to be on alert!

text:
[Player] stares at the writhing
thing in front of them and
focuses their consciousness.

options.text: A large number of paths are mixed together...
It's like they're becoming something else...

text:
The paths that use human dreams as guideposts,
and the Parallel Weapons that manifest from them.
They certainly have an existence of their own.

However, the Parallel Weapons, which should
have given power to the people,
swallowed their hosts, the attackers, and—

As if it had a will of its own,
it was writhing.

options.text: I have to close the paths, quickly!

text:
To close the paths that spat out
the Parallel Weapon-like thing,
[Player] continues to observe.

However, the many paths opened by the attackers
are distorted and intertwined, and just observing
them wears down the mind.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Hey, [Player]-san!?
Don't push yourself, and leave it to me~!
I'll just charge in and come up with something~!!

Just as Barrel was about to run off,
[Player]'s device displayed
an emergency call.

name: Exio
text:
I've grasped the general situation from the stream.
I thought that you, of all people, would once again
be at the center of the commotion.

options.text: It's an accident! Just an accident!!

name: Exio
text:
Hah... Hurry up and share this call with everyone.
What I'm about to explain won't do any good
if you're the only one hearing it, right?

Nodding at Exio's words,
[Player] shares the call with the
heroes on the stage.

name: Exio
text:
Let's start with the premise.
As you've observed, that's a path.
It's connected to a 'Parallel Weapon', yes.

options.text: You mean it's the same as a normal transformation!?

name: Exio
text:
Why 'is the path distorted', you ask?
In a normal transformation, the
transformer and the path are one-to-one.

name: Exio
text:
After all, transformation is borrowing
power from a transformer in a parallel
world who has fulfilled their dream.

name: Exio
text:
There's no difference between a hero and
a villain in that fundamental mechanism,
so normally—

name: Exio
text:
Even if one transformer tries to open
multiple paths, they shouldn't be able to transform.
The paths would cancel each other out.

name: Exio
text:
...But, the path here is actually open.
You must have noticed it when you observed it, right?
What that path actually is.

options.text: There are more paths open than there are people.
The forms of their dreams are similar, but so many different ones...
They're all tangled up, I don't know what's what...

name: Exio
text:
You're able to put your feelings into words.
That's probably what it is,
more or less, just as you said.

name: Exio
text:
Paths that should be one-to-one are
opening in large numbers, tangled with each other,
and becoming one giant path.

name: Exio
text:
This would be normally impossible,
but it's actually happening.
It's probably—

name: Exio
text:
A 'collective dream' of that group,
a conglomerate of similar dreams.

Staring at the writhing existence
over the stream, unused to its
own being, Exio continues speaking.

name: Exio
text:
All with only one dream... huh?
There's no way something
like that is possible.

options.text: I feel like people can chase the same dream...

name: Exio
text:
Even if the dream they speak of is
the same, it doesn't mean they're
envisioning the 'same result'.

name: Exio
text:
For example, even if the same group
dreams of a world without heroes,
then what kind of specific world would that be?

name: Exio
text:
The destination of a person's dream.
The form of the world they desire
can only exist within that person.

name: Exio
text:
But, even if the dreams differ from person to person,
if both the Observer and the observed acknowledge
that they are the same, they become similar in form.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Ah... Sorry to interrupt.
I kind of get the reason, but in
the end, what is that black thing?

At Roudin's words,
Exio proceeds to quietly, and clearly.
Define its existence.

name: Exio
text:
To put it simply...
It's a 'failed Parallel Weapon'.
Let's call it a 'Imposter Villain' for now.

name: Turbak
text:
That's... a Parallel Weapon?
Sorry, can you explain a
little more about it?

name: Exio
text:
The large number of paths that opened.
And, the large number of Parallel Weapons
that manifested from each of them.

name: Exio
text:
They've all blended into one,
and in trying to forcibly adapt,
they've swallowed the transformers.

name: Exio
text:
Since it's the form of their own dreams,
a Parallel Weapon should normally be controllable
by the will of its own transformer, but—

name: Exio
text:
They're being swallowed by so many
dreams that are not their own.
...They'll probably lose their egos eventually.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
That's... not okay~!!
Can't we do something~!?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
It's true, I can't accept or
forgive what those people did...
But that's exactly why~!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I have to arrest them properly~!
To just disappear like this,
that's definitely not okay~!!

options.text: I want to do something too.
There has to be a way.

name: Exio
text:
...Compassion is a virtue.
But I think it's better not to hold onto
some baseless, wishful thinking.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
But still, if we give up, it's over~!!
If there's anything I can do, I'll do it~,
so is there, is there anything we can do~!?

name: Exio
text:
To deal with it is certainly easy.
It's the same as always, just defeat it.
If the path closes, it will disappear.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Oh, that sounds great!
What, it's a simpler story than I thought.
...But then.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
...After we defeat it,
what happens to those guys?

name: Exio
text:
...Oh, a sharp point.
As expected of a magician hero.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
My bad!
To hide and to deceive is my job, yes.

name: Exio
text:
...Good grief.
I didn't say anything because I knew
you'd get involved like this.

name: Exio
text:
Honestly, I don't know what will happen.
To forcibly close a path that's overlapped
to the point that the ego can be erased.

name: Exio
text:
...At the very least,
they won't just go back to
normal as if nothing happened.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
No way...
Can't anything be done...?

options.text: What if we untangle that tangled path...
And close them one by one?

name: Exio
text:
Theoretically, it's possible.
That is, if you know the 'true dreams'
of all those attackers.

name: Exio
text:
To untangle those paths one by one, and
properly connect and close each path.
Well done, problem solved.

name: Exio
text:
So? With those numerous paths,
can you actually observe who they
were originally connected to?

options.text: I won't know until I try.
I have to act before I think!

name: Exio
text:
You don't know what will happen if you make a mistake.
Do you really think the people of Parallel
Flight will allow you to make such a gamble?

As [Player] struggles to answer,
Turbak quietly speaks up.

name: Turbak
text:
If I can know those people's dreams...
With my Parallel Weapon,
I might be able to do something.

name: Turbak
text:
If I can connect those people with
myself again and share their memories,
even deeper this time...

name: Turbak
text:
...But, people's memories and dreams,
I've never connected to them that deeply,
so I don't know if it will work...

Looking down, Turbak
clutches his Parallel Weapon.
And at that moment—

name: Guest's Voice
text:
Hey, what's that?
Is that the special stage?

name: Guest's Voice
text:
That thing on the stage,
is that a hero or a villain?
...It's, kind of creepy.

A guest's own casual remarks.
Those words echoed unusually
loudly on the silent stage.

name: Turbak
text:
.........
...Stop, don't look.
Don't look at it like that, please!!

An immense amount of anger and sadness flows
from the entity he's sharing emotions with.
As if he was swallowed by it, Turbak shouts—

name: Imposter Villain
text: GRRRRRRR!!

Letting out a roar that shakes the air,
the Imposter Villain leaps off the stage and
hurtles in the opposite direction of the audience.

name: Turbak
text:
...Those people's emotions,
they all flowed into me.
Enough to overwrite everything—

name: Turbak
text:
Anger, sadness... and fear.
The fear of having the form of your dream
being flatly rejected as 'creepy'.

name: Turbak
text:
...I, have to go.
I know it's not the right
thing to do as a hero... But.

name: Turbak
text:
If those people's dreams... All of them.
If they are just going to disappear,
then at least I want to remember them!!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Turbak-san, I'm going too~!
To be honest, I don't get all the
complicated stuff~, but—

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
It's definitely not okay for
those people to just disappear~!
If they have their own 'right'—

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I'll accept it all, and then arrest them!
Make them atone for all their sins... And then.
I'll show them the world isn't such a bad place.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I'll fight on until they understand that,
because— That's my own duty as
a police officer of justice~!

At Turbak's determined
words, Barrel smiles
and starts running.

options.text: I'll write as many reports as you want later.

name: Exio
text:
I thought as much.
...By the way, this call is being
shared within the agency.

name: Akashi
text:
...[Player].
I was watching the stream too.
I can't tell you not to go.

name: Mokdai
text:
It's true they're villains, and
we have to do something.
But...

name: Sui
text:
No matter how distorted or uncool,
there's no dream that deserves to just disappear.
So, [Player]-san.

name: Akashi
text:
Go give 'em hell!
Then, finish it all up, and
show us around the festival!

name: Huckle
text:
I'll save the lecture for when you get back.
Make sure you come back safely.
That's a direct order, got it?

Nodding at the words of
the members of the agency,
[Player] ends the call.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
The direction it headed was
towards Fortina Pavilion.
Looks like Barrel is about to catch up.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Turbak, [Player].
You two go after them,
I've got things to do here.

options.text: We would have to do something about the panic too.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
That's right.
Leave this to me.
The cast is all here, after all.

As Roudin says, he takes a look behind him.
There, the heroes who had finished closing the gates
are gathering on the stage one after another.

name: Astosis
text:
I've grasped the situation.
Should we also pursue
that attacker?

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
No. I want all of you
to stand on stage with me.
After all—

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Blow away all the guests' anxiety,
and gather a ton of ViewPower.
That's the kind of stage we need right now!

And, Roudin turns to face
Turbak directly,
and speaks to him gently.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Turbak, I'm going to cast
a spell on you now.
A spell to overcome the pressure.

name: Turbak
text:
...Roudin-san.
I'll be fine,
I'm sure I can handle it...

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
'It's okay to fail', Turbak.
You don't have to carry it all,
and if you do fail...

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
You just have to keep trying
until you succeed, that's all.

name: Goro (Ghostwoods)
text:
That's right.
Look around ya, the people here
are heroes, just like you, yeah?

name: Yohack
text:
It will be okay!
If anything happens, we'll
definitely back you up!

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Turbak-sama, please do what you can...
No, whatever you want to do,
with all your strength.

name: Lilac
text:
The power you need to accomplish that,
we'll make sure everyone receive it.
So—

name: Maculata
text:
You can fail as many times as you want,
so show us what you're made of.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
...Damn.
I was trying to look cool,
but they stole my thunder.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Listen, Turbak.
A Parallel Weapon, is
the form of your dream.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
If you think you can do it,
any miracle can happen.
So believe in your dream.

name: Turbak
text:
...Believe in my dream, huh?
Roudin-san, you say
some difficult things.

name: Turbak
text:
Leave it to me...
No, that's not it.
I'll try everything I can!

At Roudin's words,
Turbak smiles awkwardly
and runs off after Barrel.

Seeing him off with a smile,
Roudin turns to [Player]
with a smile.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Leave the rest to me...
Is what I'd like to say.
Can I ask you one last thing before you go?

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
If it's just maintaining the
observation, any 'Observer' other
than you can do it, right?

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
So, I just want you to transform the others.
...As for my observation,
I have a little idea of my own.

As Roudin says that,
he looks behind him.
There—

name: Sensettia
text:
Eh, us!?
I mean, I don't mind
helping out, but...

name: Theoreol
text:
Roudin, what you need
is an 'Observer', righT?
We don't have that abiliTY.

name: Viscunam
text:
...Kukuku, I see.
Roudin, you have yourself
quite the interesting idea.

options.text: Roudin-san, your idea for observation is...

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Hehe, that's right.
When this is over, it looks like I'll
be writing a report with you.

name: Sensettia
text:
You're out of your mind, you...
Well, I don't really mind
that sort of thing!

name: Theoreol
text:
Anonymous have responded to uS.
Your transformation
can be maintaineD!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Oh, that's a big help.
You guys, join me
for the best stage ever.

name: Viscunam
text:
...Oi, hold it.
Why are we supposed
to be on stage too?

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Isn't it obvious?
To get the crowd excited,
'LIVE@HERO' and Anonymous—

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Both are in on a 'simulcast'.
It's guaranteed to
be a huge success!

name: Sensettia
text:
...Hah, ahahaha!
You're pretty interesting, aren't you!
Alright, don't leave me out of this!

name: Theoreol
text:
Does that mean me as weLL?
...I see, it's been hundreds of years
since I've been in the public eyE—

name: Theoreol
text:
It might be a good opportunity to learn
the difference in values from those dayS.
Very interestiNG!

name: Viscunam
text:
Wait, don't just decide on your own!
I should be making a name for myself
with my inventions...

name: Sensettia
text:
Alright, alright, don't sweat
the details! [Player],
time for you to go for it!

[Player] approves the heroes'
transformations, and confirms that the
observation has been passed on.

And seeing off [Player], who immediately
runs off after Barrel and the others,
Roudin walks to the center of the stage.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
(The fear of having the form of your dreams
rejected, huh? I get it too, because I've been
dealing with it for a really long time.)

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
(If things had been a little different,
I might have become the same
as them... But...)

name: Roudin
text:
(To live with your head down,
just looking at the ground.
That kind of life can change.)

name: Roudin
text:
(When you're tired of looking down,
and you happen to look up,
there might be a hand reaching out to you.)

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
(...Ah, I see.
I finally get it, the meaning
of this Parallel Weapon.)

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
(I want to leave it all behind.
It's okay to be in pain, to look down.
The ground in front of me is colored...)

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
(The sky I happen to look up at is also colored,
and I can smile even for just a moment,
for just that one moment.)

And with a huge smile on his face,
Roudin's voice echoes
to the audience.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
To all our esteemed guests!
Sorry for getting you caught
up in a little trouble!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
That thing just now—
Was this stage's highlight!
A special guest!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
From here on out, this stage
will be on a simultaneous
broadcast with Fortina Pavilion.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
It's a magical time for tonight only.
Until the very end, don't you dare miss it!!

Roudin and the others take the stage,
and just as they're about to start
their brilliant show, at Fortina Pavilion—

name: Imposter Villain
text: GRRRRRRR!!

[Player] and the others were
also facing the roaring
Imposter Villain head-on.

options.text: But we have to do something.

name: Turbak
text:
I'll be fine!
Sorry, I can't say that for sure...
But—

name: Turbak
text:
Barrel-kun, Roudin-san,
and everyone I met here
believed in me.

name: Turbak
text:
So, I want to give them back!
The memories of this event,
that everyone smiled and had fun with!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
You can do it, Turbak-san!
It's not about what's right for me,
because I just wanted to help those people...

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
So if that 'cool' is in your heart,
there's nothing you can't do~!!
I'm sure of it~!!

options.text: We're going to have the best festival ever!

text: Battle Start

The following text is displayed right inside the battle,
so for the best experience, I'd recommend opening the game right beside it!

name: Sensettia
text:
I ended up on stage in the heat of the moment,
but was this really a good idea...?

name: Viscunam
text:
You dragged me out here against my will,
and you're saying that now, young lady?
Besides, you—

name: Viscunam
text:
You're delivering your song to the universe,
aren't you? Don't tell me, a stage
like this got you on cold feet?

name: Sensettia
text:
...Of course not!
Just watch me, I'll make every single guest say
my singing was the most exciting part!

name: Theoreol
text:
Kukuku.
It's only a matter of time before
we take control of this eveNT.

name: Sensettia
text:
We're done with that topic.
And you, you can't
even get a joke right...

name: Theoreol
text:
A homunculus joke, yeS!
A festival is about providing the extraordinary,
so I've adjusted my speech a littlE.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Haha!
If you've got that much stage presence,
you don't need my advice, so let's get going!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
To all our guests!
Welcome to the Galaxy Carnival Expo
Special Stage!!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
What begins here is a magical
time for tonight only, a joint performance
of festivals that connect the stars!!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Until the very last moment,
don't you dare miss it, okay?
It's showtime!!
[Trigger condition: Spectator Gauge filled to 50%]

name: Maculata
text:
My, it's getting exciting.
From here on, we'll be even more aggressive, shall we?
Everyone, are you ready?

name: Astosis
text:
Of course, Maculata-san.
The people of Clouge are watching, so we have
to make sure they enjoy it until the end.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Hehe, leave it to me!
We'll make this a stage that makes everyone
glad they came to this event!

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Well then, shall we go, everyone?
Let's show all our guests
our full hospitality!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Waha, as expected of Roudin-san!
ViewPower is rolling in~!

name: Turbak
text:
Yes, it's really encouraging!
We have to do our best too!

name: Turbak
text:
Barrel-kun, [Player]-kun.
In order for me to connect my thread,
their movements must be stopped first.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Leave it to me, Turbak-san~!
Let's wrap this up quickly and
get back to the super fun festival~!!

options.text: Let's end the festival with everyone smiling!

text: [Trigger condition: Imposter Villain's HP falls below 50%]

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Aaaall-right!!
That was pretty effective~!?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Turbak-san,
now's our chance~!
Let's finish it as cool as we can~!!

name: Turbak
text:
I'll try!
Please, don't move...
Let us, connect and share!!

name: Turbak
text:
Wha...!?
The thread was repelled...!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
That black stuff is regenerating~!?
This is going to be pretty troublesome...

name: Turbak
text:
Sorry, Barrel-kun.
Even though you've gave me a chance.
At this rate...

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
No 'sorry' or 'impossible' right now~!
It's alright, we'll get another chance~!
Come on, let's keep attacking~!!

name: Turbak
text:
B-But...
At this rate, the ViewPower...

options.text: Roudin-san and the others are working hard, too!

name: Turbak
text:
You two... Thank you.
Alright, I'll count on you again!
This time, I'll definitely do it!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Hehe, leave it to me!
As Orient City's number one festival man, I'll make a
chance for you no matter how many times it takes~!!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
(The stage is in its second half, huh?
Their situation...
Doesn't look like they're having an easy time.)

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
...Well now.
We need to get this place even more excited,
but what should I do?

name: Goro (Ghostwoods)
text:
That's obvious, ain't it?
First, ya gotta do something
about that gloomy face.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Fufu, as Goro-sama says, first,
you have to enjoy yourself, Roudin-sama.
It's alright, because—

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
You can create such a wonderful flower field!
All the guests down there,
they will definitely be captivated!

name: Goro (Ghostwoods)
text:
O-Oh?
I feel like you went in a different direction halfway,
but that's pretty much it!

name: Lilac (Summer Nights)
text:
Ah, ahaha...
I'm sure you'll be fine, Roudin-san.
I believe in you.

name: Lilac (Summer Nights)
text:
Roudin-san, your magic can make
people smile, again and again!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
You guys... Haha.
Damn it, I was just about
to lose my role as a magician.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Just because my work has picked up a little,
I was thinking about unnecessary things.
...Remember, what it is that's most important.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
I love magic!
I want to leave behind the best smiles
and memories with my stage!!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
So please,
lend me your strength!
[Trigger condition: Spectator Gauge filled to 100%]

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Alright, everyone!
On this festival on the moon,
the magical time is reaching its climax!!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
To those who are enjoying the festival.
―And to those who aren't.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Now, this very moment.
The moment where you can forget everything and laugh.
Won't you grant me the privilege to deliver it to you?

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
I'll show you a spectacular illusion
that will repaint the festival sky!
Come and take a good look!!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Wooooow!
That's a huge firework~,
Ta-ma-ya~!!

たーまやー (tamaya): a popular call for when fireworks are launched
it came from the time people shouted a brand name that they thought made the best fireworks
the two main competitors at the time were 玉屋 (Tamaya) and 鍵屋 (Kagiya)

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
A ton of ViewPower is coming in too~!
One more time, one more chance to take~!!

name: Turbak
text:
This is the chance Roudin-san and everyone have given me.
This time... I'll connect them!
Please, [Player]-kun!!
[Trigger condition: Imposter Villain's HP reaches 0%]

name: Turbak
text:
Alright!
Its movements stopped...!

name: Turbak
text:
This time for sure...
I have to succeed!

name: Turbak
text:
Everyone is counting on me.
I... I have to
bring happiness to everyone...!

options.text: If it doesn't work, we'll just try again!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
It's just as [Player]-san says~!
If this doesn't work,
it's totally fine~!!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
No matter how many chances you need,
I'll make them for you~!
If it doesn't work once, try again!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
If it doesn't work again,
we'll do it as many times as it takes!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
And if it still doesn't work after that...
We'll do it all together~!!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Because a hero is someone
who stops at nothing until
they see their justice through~!!

name: Turbak
text:
...Never stop, huh?
Thank you, Barrel-kun,
I've calmed down a little.

name: Turbak
text:
This time for sure... No.
I'll try as many times as it takes!
Lend me your strength until the end!!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
—That's what I wanted to hear~!
Alright!!
Let's go, you two!!

name: Imposter Villain
text: GRRRRRRR!!

Damaged in battle, the Imposter Villain's
black, sludge-like exterior
begins to peel off, little by little.

And, at the moment it raises its arm
in a desperate swing,
a shadow slips into its range.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Channnnnce~!
This is where we end it~!!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
—"Surefire"!
ZAP&SLAAAAAAAASH!!
Finiiiiiish~!!

Responding to Barrel's shout,
thunder and lightning cover
Barrel's Parallel Weapon.

And just like so,
it slashes through the sludge-like,
hardened exterior.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Turbak-san!
Now~!!

name: Turbak
text:
Roger!
[Player]-kun,
I need ViewPower!!

options.text: ViewPower, I'm giving it all to you!

name: Turbak
text:
I won't let these feelings be erased.
I'll connect them, share them!
I'll make sure they remain forever!!

name: Turbak
text:
—'Heart-to-Heart'!
Filo di Unione!!

'LIVE@HERO' and Anonymous—
A massive amount of ViewPower from
Roudin and the others' simulcast stage.

Poured into him all at once,
Turbak's staff-shaped Parallel
Weapon emits a dazzling light.

And, a beautiful thread spun from the light
is released from the tip of the staff,
connecting the black shadow, Turbak, and [Player].

name: Turbak
text:
Let's go, [Player]-kun.
To the journey that connects people's dreams and memories.
...It will be okay.

name: Turbak
text:
I'll guide your journey until the end.
So— No matter what happens.
Please, lend a hand to those people.

With Turbak's smile,
[Player]'s vision
gradually fades to black.

And, into their mind, the Imposter Villain—
The memories of the people connected
to the tangled paths began to flow.

name: Kaibutsu
text: Pigyaaaa!!

The person I loved from the bottom of my heart,
my child, being devoured right in front of me.
My vision turned red, and when I came to my senses—

It was already over.
A hero rushed in, and the Kaibutsu was defeated.
Everyone forgot about my family, and returned to their daily lives.

name: Lone Attacker
text:
Why...!
Why.. am I made a hero!?

A little while after that, I found out
that I had awakened the ability to transform.
And then, the people around me—

name: Resident
text:
Isn't that great!?
You lost your family to a Kaibutsu, right?
Now you can fight back against those Kaibutsu!

name: Resident
text:
That's true!
Then, if we're attacked by a Kaibutsu,
you'll definitely protect us, right!?

...Why?
For what reason, do I have to fight?
I dream of that moment, over and over—

That fear from that time keeps coming back to me.
Sure, I may have the power to fight,
but I don't have the courage to fight.

You don't even remember what was important to me.
Why do I have to fight?
Why do I have to protect you?

Why... for strangers who know nothing!
Because 'I'm a hero', because 'I can fight'.
Who are you to tell me I have to stand up for you!?

name: Stream Comment
text:
'Hey, that new hero...
Isn't he kind of lame?'

name: Stream Comment
text:
'Yeah, he seems kinda lackluster.
And his Parallel Weapon
is kind of plain, yea?'

I had a dream.
To others, it might seem absurd.
But, it was my one and only dream.

One day, that dream lent me its power.
My very own Parallel Weapon,
the form of my precious... dream.

name: Lone Attacker
text:
What do you even know about me!?
Don't you talk about my dream like that!
This dream of mine isn't your entertainment!!

Because I had power, because I
thought my dream could help people.
I became a hero.

My dream is judged by people over a stream.
They demand to see more of the form of
my dreams, because it entertains them.

...What hero, what stream?
You don't even try to know
what my dream really is like.

Multiple memories flow into [Player],
with sadness and hatred so deep
they can almost be considered pain...

Focusing to not be consumed by them,
[Player] follows the memories,
untangles the paths, and closes them.

And, after closing all the paths,
to return to reality, they follow
the thread in their hand.

name: Turbak
text:
Good work, [Player]-kun!
I felt it too, the paths closing.
You're really an amazing person!

At the voice they had grown accustomed to
over the past few days, [Player] turns around.
In their line of sight—

name: Turbak
text:
While you were tracing down those
people's dreams, I received a little
bit of the overwritten emotions.

name: Turbak
text:
...I'm truly happy.
I was able to properly
guide you on your journey.

There was Turbak, most of his body
being swallowed by the sludge-like
mass that had covered the attackers.

name: Turbak
text:
Now, all that's left is to go back.
Just follow that thread,
it's connected to Barrel-kun!

options.text: There's no way I can go back!
Turbak-san, what's going to happen to you?

name: Turbak
text:
The same as those people.
...But, it's okay!
The heroes will handle the rest!

name: Turbak
text:
If the path is closed, this
black thing will disappear, right?
If that's the case, go back to reality...

name: Turbak
text:
...And then, defeat me.
That way, everyone can be happy!

options.text: There's no way I can do that!

name: Turbak
text:
...It's fine.
Because, you see, I wished for it.
This dream that's enveloping me—

name: Turbak
text:
That these people are sad,
that they hate the world, that they resent it.
That they want to erase everything.

name: Turbak
text:
I want to properly share
those kinds of feelings too.
...So, I'll take it all.

His face swallowed, his expression unseen.
But even so, Turbak still laughs.
And then—

name: Turbak
text:
...This is fine, right?
I was a good boy until the end...
I made everyone happy, right...?

With those quiet, muttered words,
Turbak is completely swallowed,
and silence envelops the area.
